channel.title: Comments on: T-SQL Tuesday #41 – If I Can Do It, So Can You!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Paul, it's never too late to practice public speaking. I'd recommend Toastmasters if you want to learn how to improve. It's done wonderful things for me - and I suspect I'm similar to you in this respect. Good luck and congrats!
item.content:encoded: Paul, it’s never too late to practice public speaking. I’d recommend Toastmasters if you want to learn how to improve. It’s done wonderful things for me – and I suspect I’m similar to you in this respect. Good luck and congrats!
